vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development Subdistrict on property zoned a GR General Retail Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 193, the Oak Lawn Special Purpose District, on the south corner of Lemmon Avenue and Douglas Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Denial
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a development/landscape plan and conditions
Z190-324(LG)
